const npage = Math.ceil(attendanceReport.length / recordsPerPage) const numbers = [...Array(npage + 1).keys()].slice(1) return (

); function prePage() { if (currentPage !== 1) { setCurrentPage(currentPage - 1) } } function changeCPage(id) { setCurrentPage(id) } function nextPage() { if (currentPage !== npage) { setCurrentPage(currentPage + 1) } } }; export default NativeGenerateAttendanceReport;
